description: Try our easy to follow Creamy Cauliflower & Celeriac Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Creamy Cauliflower & Celeriac Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add stock to pan and stir well to mix with pan juices. Boil to reduce by a quarter. Reduce heat to medium, add peppercorns and cream. Simmer for 2-3 minutes or until thickened. Serve steaks on mash with sauce drizzled and parsley sprinkled over, and green beans.
